name: MachineMST_G
query:
select trim(MchNumber) as MchNumber, trim(MchID) as MchID, trim(ipOPC) as ipOPC from MachineMST
where MchLoc = 'INJ Bld G' and UAP = 'BASIC' and Brand = 'HAITIAN' and MchNumber != '' and Active = 1
order by MchNumber ASC

name: function 4
function 3
func:
const divisorMap = {
    // Charge
    "ns=2;i=20010": { title: "Charge_BackPress_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20011": { title: "Charge_BackPress_S2", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20012": { title: "Charge_BackPress_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20037": { title: "Charge_Pressure_S1", divisor: 10, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20038": { title: "Charge_Pressure_S2", divisor: 10, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20039": { title: "Charge_Pressure_SE", divisor: 10, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20042": { title: "Charge_Position_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20043": { title: "Charge_Position_S2", divisor: 10000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20044": { title: "Charge_Position_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20046": { title: "Charge_Speed_S1", divisor: 1, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20047": { title: "Charge_Speed_S2", divisor: 1, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20048": { title: "Charge_Speed_S3", divisor: 1, unit: "%" },
    // COOLING TIME
    "ns=2;i=20056": { title: "Cooling_Time", divisor: 1000, unit: "" },
    // CORE
    "ns=2;i=20073": { title: "Core_DelayTime_AIn", divisor: 1, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20076": { title: "Core_Mode_AIn", divisor: 1, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20079": { title: "Core_MoldPost_AIn", divisor: 10000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20085": { title: "Core_Time_AIn", divisor: 1000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20094": { title: "Core_DelayTime_AOut", divisor: 1, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20097": { title: "Core_Mode_AOut", divisor: 1, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20100": { title: "Core_MoldPost_AOut", divisor: 10000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20103": { title: "Core_Time_AOut", divisor: 1000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20109": { title: "Core_Flow_AIn", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20110": { title: "Core_Press_AIn", divisor: 1, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20111": { title: "Core_Flow_AOut", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20112": { title: "Core_Press_AOut", divisor: 1, unit: "" },
    // EJECTOR BWD
    "ns=2;i=20146": { title: "EjectBWD_Pressure_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20148": { title: "EjectBWD_Pressure_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20149": { title: "EjectBWD_Post_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20151": { title: "EjectBWD_Post_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20153": { title: "EjectBWD_Speed_S1", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20155": { title: "EjectBWD_Speed_SE", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    // EJECTOR FWD
    "ns=2;i=20156": { title: "EjectFWD_Pressure_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20158": { title: "EjectFWD_Pressure_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20159": { title: "EjectFWD_Post_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20161": { title: "EjectFWD_Post_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20163": { title: "EjectFWD_Speed_S1", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20165": { title: "EjectFWD_Speed_SE", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    // HOLDING
    "ns=2;i=20190": { title: "Holding_Pressure_P1", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20191": { title: "Holding_Pressure_P2", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20192": { title: "Holding_Pressure_P3", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20195": { title: "Holding_Time_P1", divisor: 1000, unit: "s" },
    "ns=2;i=20196": { title: "Holding_Time_P2", divisor: 1000, unit: "s" },
    "ns=2;i=20197": { title: "Holding_Time_P3", divisor: 1000, unit: "s" },
    "ns=2;i=20596": { title: "Holding_HoldSpeed_P1", divisor: 10000, unit: "%" },
    // INJECT
    "ns=2;i=20250": { title: "Inject_Pressure_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20251": { title: "Inject_Pressure_S2", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20252": { title: "Inject_Pressure_S3", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20255": { title: "Inject_Pressure_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "MPa" },
    "ns=2;i=20256": { title: "Inject_Position_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20257": { title: "Inject_Position_S2", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20258": { title: "Inject_Position_S3", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20261": { title: "Inject_Position_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20265": { title: "Inject_Speed_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm/s" },
    "ns=2;i=20266": { title: "Inject_Speed_S2", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm/s" },
    "ns=2;i=20267": { title: "Inject_Speed_S3", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm/s" },
    "ns=2;i=20270": { title: "Inject_Speed_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm/s" },
    // CLOSE MOLD
    "ns=2;i=20306": { title: "CloseMold_Position_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20307": { title: "CloseMold_Position_S2", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20308": { title: "CloseMold_Position_S3", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20309": { title: "CloseMold_Position_LP", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20310": { title: "CloseMold_Position_HP", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20311": { title: "CloseMold_Position_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20314": { title: "CloseMold_Speed_S1", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20315": { title: "CloseMold_Speed_S2", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20316": { title: "CloseMold_Speed_S3", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20317": { title: "CloseMold_Speed_LP", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20318": { title: "CloseMold_Speed_HP", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20319": { title: "CloseMold_Speed_SE", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    // Open Mold
    "ns=2;i=20330": { title: "OpenMold_Position_S1", divisor: 10000, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20331": { title: "OpenMold_Position_S2", divisor: 10000, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20332": { title: "OpenMold_Position_S3", divisor: 10000, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20333": { title: "OpenMold_Position_S4", divisor: 10000, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20334": { title: "OpenMold_Position_S5", divisor: 10000, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20335": { title: "OpenMold_Position_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20337": { title: "OpenMold_Speed_S1", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20338": { title: "OpenMold_Speed_S2", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20339": { title: "OpenMold_Speed_S3", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20340": { title: "OpenMold_Speed_S4", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20341": { title: "OpenMold_Speed_S5", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    "ns=2;i=20342": { title: "OpenMold_Speed_SE", divisor: 10, unit: "%" },
    // NOTE / CUSHION
    "ns=2;i=20505": { title: "Note_Cushion", divisor: 10000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20506": { title: "Note_CycleTime", divisor: 1000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20507": { title: "Note_ActInjtTime", divisor: 1000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20511": { title: "Note_PlastTime", divisor: 1000, unit: "s" },
    "ns=2;i=20509": { title: "Note_InjStartPos", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20510": { title: "Note_MinCushionPos", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    // SUCK BACK AFTER CHARGE
    "ns=2;i=20554": { title: "SuckBackAfterCharge_mm", divisor: 10000, unit: "mm" },
    "ns=2;i=20555": { title: "SuckBackAfterCharge_pct", divisor: 100000, unit: "%" },
    // TEMPERATURE - REAL
    "ns=2;i=20556": { title: "Temperature_Real_Zone1", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20557": { title: "Temperature_Real_Zone2", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20558": { title: "Temperature_Real_Zone3", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20559": { title: "Temperature_Real_Zone4", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20560": { title: "Temperature_Real_Zone5", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20561": { title: "Temperature_Real_Zone6", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    // TEMPERATURE - SET
    "ns=2;i=20564": { title: "Temperature_Set_Zone1", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20565": { title: "Temperature_Set_Zone2", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20566": { title: "Temperature_Set_Zone3", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20567": { title: "Temperature_Set_Zone4", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20568": { title: "Temperature_Set_Zone5", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20569": { title: "Temperature_Set_Zone6", divisor: 10, unit: "" },
    // TEMPERATURE - HOPPER
    "ns=2;i=20610": { title: "Temperature_Real_Hopper", divisor: 10, unit: "C" },
    "ns=2;i=20611": { title: "Temperature_Set_Hopper", divisor: 10, unit: "C" },
    "ns=2;i=20612": { title: "Temperature_Max_Hopper", divisor: 10, unit: "C" },
    "ns=2;i=20613": { title: "Temperature_Min_Hopper", divisor: 10, unit: "C" },
    // V/P
    "ns=2;i=20624": { title: "VP_Mode", divisor: 1, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20514": { title: "VP_Time", divisor: 1000, unit: "" },
    "ns=2;i=20512": { title: "VP_Position", divisor: 10000, unit: "" },
    // TONNAGE
    "ns=2;i=20049": { title: "Tonnage_Set", divisor: 100, unit: "" },
    // FRED
    "ns=2;i=20028": { title: "CarriageBWD_SE", divisor: 10000, unit: "" }
    // Tambahkan sampai 130 parameter di sini
};

global.set("HaitianZE3600_Parameter_Master", divisorMap);
return msg;
